title: Tags
body:
Tags is the most useful and important feature in the CMS. When you have enormous pages of contents, it becomes difficult for you to organize the relationship between the articles. For example if you wanted to show the related content of an article you must keep track of all the pages and its information and find a way to pick them and show that below an article.

How to create Tags?

  • First create the Tags Go to menu Structure -> Taxonomy -> Tags -> Add Term
  • While creating book page (Contents and Content MenuList), you can find a Tags drop down box. The tags you created will be listed there.
  • Choose appropriate tags for the page you create.
  • Multiple pages can be tagged under a Tag name.
  • Now in the mobile application you can see all the pages that were tagged will be listed under the Tag name(as Heading) below the article.
